name: sb6rf

comment: Reversed substitution. For a version requiring disjoint variables, but fewer axioms, see ~ sb6rfv . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 21-Sep-2018.)
